works.description: Based in Herford in Eastern Westphalia, Germany since 1978, T+A has been has been building extraordinary loudspeakers for more than 30 years. The latest from the German firm is the Solitaire CWT Series luxury speakers for the most demanding audiophiles. The three loudspeakers in the Solitaire line include the CWT 500, CWT 1000 and the CWT 2000. All three models are based on the principle of the Cylinder Wave Transducer (CWT), which is designed to create a very homogeneous sound field between the speakers
